info.description: Backend API endpoints for the Least Portals Database.
info.title: Least Portals Database API

get.description: Get maps from the specified chapter id.
Get demo with specified demo uuid.
Get chapters from the specified game id.
Get (redirect) login page for Steam auth.
Get score logs of every player.
Get map discussions with specified map id.

post.description: Create map discussion with specified map id.

get.description: Get map discussion with specified map and discussion id.

put.description: Edit map discussion with specified map id.

delete.description: Delete map summary with specified map id.

put.description: Edit map image with specified map id.

get.description: Get map leaderboards with specified id.

post.description: Post record with demo of a specific map.

delete.description: Delete record with specified map and record id.

get.description: Get map summary with specified id.

put.description: Edit map summary with specified map id.

post.description: Create map summary with specified map id.

delete.description: Delete map summary with specified map id.

get.description: Get profile page of session user.

put.description: Update country code of session user.

post.description: Update profile page of session user.

get.description: Get all user and map data matching to the query.
Gets the token cookie value from the user.

delete.description: Deletes the token cookie from the user.

get.description: Get profile page of another user.
